name: DANGO!
description:
BEAUTIFUL 100 ACHIEVEMENTS!



DANGO! - is a casual liquid puzzle game. You need to pass a variety of levels, draw a path through which the liquid will flow and fill the vessel. DANGO! - is a fascinating arcade game with beautiful music, lots of levels and colorful anime-style illustrations. In the game DANGO you expect 60 extraordinarily beautiful, complex and interesting levels, on the passage of which you will open full access to the Gallery.

What can be found in this game:


  • Challenging and interesting puzzles
  • Beautiful anime illustrations
  • Incredible sound and visual effects
  • 100 colorful achievements
  • Gallery with anime illustrations that you will unlock as you progress through the levels



DANGO! has fun and interesting gameplay, challenging levels, pleasant music and beautiful anime illustrations.
You'll have a good time in this game as you unlock the illustrations in the gallery as you progress through the levels!
